General.Name: Kingman Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Kingman Minerals Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of resource properties. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It has an option agreement to acquire 100% interest in the Mohave project that comprises 20 mineral claims located in Mohave County, Arizona, the United States. The company was formerly known as Astorius Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Kingman Minerals Ltd. in April 2020. Kingman Minerals Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 555 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N6
